name: Better Faster Slower
description:
In Better Faster Slower, you drive a car in differents levels where you will have to be as fast as possible !

But you will also have to slow down because there is some obstacles on your way !

This is the jam version of the game, i made it for the Nokia 3310 Jam 5 and you can play in three levels !

Controls :

Left/Right arrows to move

Up/Down arrows to change your speed

Enter key to enter a level

Escape key to return to the main menu
